name: Automated Source-Data Verification (SDV)
purpose: Use NLP to compare EHR-export PDFs against EDC entries, cutting CRA effort by 50%.

risks.description: Site EHR export formats highly variable.
risks.mitigation: Develop format-agnostic OCR layer; recruit 3 pilot sites for testing.

risks.description: Limited GPU capacity in on-prem cluster may slow model inference.
risks.mitigation: Migrate inference to cloud burst; reserve compute credits ahead.

risks.description: Change-management resistance from CRAs unwilling to trust automated SDV.
risks.mitigation: Run side-by-side validation; provide training & incentives.

achievements.summary: Completed user-journey workshops with 18 CRAs across three regions.
Mapped 14 common EHR layouts covering 65% of pilot sites.
Finalized functional requirements spec with stakeholder sign-off.
Initiated recruitment for 3 pilot sites, 1 site confirmed participation.
